thread.section_title: Amba Hotel Charing Cross - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Highly recommendable!
thread.title_full: Highly recommendable! - Review of Amba Hotel Charing Cross, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: walter402
title: Highly recommendable!
text:
Our second stay at the Amber.
Perfect location for visiting London, many attractions nearby.
Tube and busstops only some steps away.
Nice, modern and comfortable room with many amenities like wifi, ipad, free minibar etc..
Absolutely clean and well-equipped bathroom.
Great English breakfast buffet.
Very warm and friendly staff, helpful at all times (special thanks to Chiara and Cus!).
A hotel with a really nice character and athmosphere.
We would be happy to come back soon!
